native-queries.query: SELECT ID, EMP_NO EMPLOYEE_NO, PHONE_NO, AGE, EMAIL_ID, ENAME NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE 1 = 1 <#if query.name??>AND ENAME LIKE '%${query.name}%'</#if> <#if query.minAge??>AND AGE >= ?{query.minAge}</#if> <#if query.maxAge??>AND AGE <= ?{query.maxAge}</#if> ORDER BY EMP_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE 1 = 1 <#if query.name??>AND ENAME LIKE '%${query.name}%'</#if> <#if query.minAge??>AND AGE >= ?{query.minAge}</#if> <#if query.maxAge??>AND AGE <= ?{query.maxAge}</#if>
INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE(EMP_NO, EMAIL_ID, ENAME, PHONE_NO, AGE) VALUES(?{emp.employeeNo}, ?{emp.emailId}, ?{emp.name}, ?{emp.phoneNo}, ?{emp.age})
DELETE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE 1 = 1 <#if query.name??>AND ENAME LIKE '%${query.name}%'</#if>
